p: Antioxidant activity of extracts obtained from OD Haw fruit (ODHF) and its active compounds on low-density lipoprotein (LDL) peroxidation by Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity and oxygen-radical absorbance capacity approaches were in the order of seed > peel > pulp. Reduction of lipid peroxidation in human plasma showed that this plant possesses great antioxidant effects [ 43].
